医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
外科医生对全髋关节置换手术中使用的两种假体柄的性能提供了见解需要进行髋关节置换术是不幸的，但更不幸的是需要再次进行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Surgeons-provide-insights-into-performance-of-two-types-of-stems-used-in-total-hip-replacement-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Surgeons-provide-insights-into-performance-of-two-types-of-stems-used-in-total-hip-replacement-surgery.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cb9972c-6638-4873-9ab6-a9ca54603922 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 09:12:44 -0400 Surgeons provide insights into performance of two types of stems used in total hip replacement surgery
新的临床前模型为研究帕金森病过程提供了独特的平台威尔康奈尔医学研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，一种新的临床前模型为研究帕金森病过程提供了一个独特的平台，并提出了一种相对简单的方法来检测人类疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/New-preclinical-model-offers-a-unique-platform-for-stuying-Parkinsons-disease-process.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/New-preclinical-model-offers-a-unique-platform-for-stuying-Parkinsons-disease-process.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8fb0b7c-6728-4c78-ac73-dd128ae04b1c Tue, 23 Jul 2024 09:08:49 -0400 New preclinical model offers a unique platform for studying Parkinson's disease process
研究警告前往火星的宇航员存在药物过期风险国际空间站宇航员使用的药物可能不足以支持为期三年的火星之旅。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Study-warns-of-medication-expiry-risk-for-Mars-bound-astronauts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Study-warns-of-medication-expiry-risk-for-Mars-bound-astronauts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e039485d-b94b-4ae9-bdb1-6f93fc3c7067 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 09:05:37 -0400 Study warns of medication expiry risk for Mars-bound astronauts
PrEPVacc HIV 疫苗试验显示感染率没有减少2020 年至 2024 年间在东部和南部非洲进行的 PrEPVacc HIV 疫苗试验的结果最终表明，所测试的两种实验疫苗方案都没有减少研究人群中的 HIV 感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/PrEPVacc-HIV-vaccine-trial-shows-no-reduction-in-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/PrEPVacc-HIV-vaccine-trial-shows-no-reduction-in-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ced61ec1-dafb-4863-80d3-d4b8bb9dfe57 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 09:01:48 -0400 PrEPVacc HIV vaccine trial shows no reduction in infections
对中风引起的免疫变化的表观遗传学见解中风不仅会对大脑造成急性损伤，还会对心脏等其他器官产生长期的健康影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Epigenic-insights-into-中风-induced-immunological-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Epigenic-insights-into-中风-induced-immunological-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0384967f-1803-4cfb-88b7-e953054f0860 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 08:55:46 -0400 Epigenetic insights into stroke-induced immunological changes
Lario Therapeutics 获得 Michael J. Fox 基金会 600 万美元的资助，用于帕金森氏症研究该奖项支持 Lario 的 CaV2.3 钙通道抑制剂的临床前研究，作为治疗帕金森病的一种新型疾病缓解方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Lario-Therapeutics-awarded-246M-Grant-from-The-Michael-J-Fox-Foundation-for-Parkinsone28099s-Research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Lario-Therapeutics-awarded-246M-Grant-from-The-Michael-J-Fox-Foundation-for-Parkinsone28099s-Research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8699dfbc-2e54-44cc-9466-961aa03f36fa Tue, 23 Jul 2024 08:54:00 -0400 Lario Therapeutics awarded $6M Grant from The Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson’s Research
研究调查了暴露组评分与整个童年时期代谢健康之间的联系环境暴露和不健康的生活习惯的综合影响对儿童心脏代谢健康的影响可能超出其单独影响的程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Study-investigates-the-link- Between-an-exposome-score-and-metabolic-health-across-childhood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Study-investigates-the-link- Between-an-exposome-score-and-metabolic-health-across-childhood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f8734aa-0017-40b4-9f18-915045081c30 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 07:35:44 -0400 Study investigates the link between an exposome score and metabolic health across childhood
新发现揭示了人工智能在临床环境中的潜力美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的研究人员发现，人工智能 (AI) 模型能够高精度地解决医疗测验问题，旨在测试卫生专业人员根据临床图像和简短文本摘要诊断患者的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/New-findings-shed-light-on-AIs-pottial-in-clinical-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/New-findings-shed-light-on-AIs-pottial-in-clinical-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a17fcec1-00ab-4e8c-b99a-7186c643c638 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 07:10:40 -0400 New findings shed light on AI's potential in clinical settings
新方法可快速测定病毒感染性一种可以快速确定病毒是否具有传染性或非传染性的新方法可能会彻底改变对未来流行病的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/New-method-can-rapidly-define-virus-infectivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/New-method-can-rapidly-define-virus-infectivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7b1c740-798f-496b-a35d-f35c367a5ce4 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 07:04:21 -0400 New method can rapidly determine virus infectivity
较高的大脑护理分数与较低的晚年抑郁风险相关晚年抑郁症通常被定义为在 60 岁以上的个体中发病的抑郁症，可能影响多达三分之一或更多的 60 岁以上的人，并且可能使人衰弱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Higher-Brain-Care-Score-linked-with-lower-risk-of-late-life-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Higher-Brain-Care-Score-linked-with-lower-risk-of-late-life-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=078b81b3-fe5c-4e5a-8bf0-5d02f6ca2fd0 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 06:51:26 -0400 Higher Brain Care Score associated with lower risk of late-life depression
